Does Amazon use Angular 2? - Quora
s: Answer (1 of 3): It depends on the project on which you are working. The actual Amazon home page uses their own UI tools, but internal projects like the various teams working on AWS all make their own decisions. Some teams use their own, others use React, and still others use Elm or Angular.
